text: 10:2 Jenesis 35:19Nɨ na ategh mangɨva, Benjaminɨn nguazimɨn mɨtaghniamɨn, Selsan nguibamɨn, me Resel afazir dagɨar mozimɨn boroghɨn gumazir pumuning batogham. Eghtɨ aning donkin nɨ ruiagha aruibar gun nɨ mɨkɨm suam, me dar api, ezɨ nɨn afeziam dagh nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ, a nɨ gɨnɨghnɨgha azangsɨghavɨra ikia ghaze, kɨ manmaghɨn uan otarim damuam.
